comment: By far my favorite class/teacher at KSU. Dr. Mason is amazing, funny, and always willing to help. I hate that she's moving back to Kansas but she really was great and they're lucky to have her.

Mason is nice in a Middle School teacher kind of way. Doesn't treat students as college-level and has grade school rules about packing up books, raising your hand etc. I found her sort of "lost" most of the time. Hopefully she will improve with experience. I'd guess I'd give her a second shot, but would rather not if I could avoid.
